eu.ueb.acem.web.controllers

Class AbstractDomainAwareBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractI18nAwareBean
      • org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractApplicationAwareBean
        • org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractJsfMessagesAwareBean
          • eu.ueb.acem.web.controllers.AbstractDomainAwareBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.esupportail.commons.web.controllers.Resettable, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractContextAwareController, SessionController

    @Component(value="abstractDomainAwareBean")
public abstract class AbstractDomainAwareBean
extends org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractJsfMessagesAwareBean
implements org.esupportail.commons.web.controllers.Resettable
    An abstract class inherited by all the beans for them to get: - the domain service (domainService). - the application service (applicationService). - the i18n service (i18nService).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
